text: Shinsuke Numata (; born 1978) is a Japanese writer. He was born in Otaru. He was awarded 157th Akutagawa Prize in 2017, for Eiri (影裏). ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese writers Category:Winners of the Akutagawa Prize Category:People from Otaru
title: Shinsuke Numata
